sentence.Network_cn: 他手脚摊开横躺在床上。

entry.tran: (书籍、唱片或电影)标准长度的，未经删节的
entry.def: A full-length book, record, or film is the normal length, rather than being shorter than normal.

example.ex: ...his first full-length recording in well over a decade.
example.tran: 他十好几年以来第一张足长的唱片

entry.tran: (上衣或裙子)长及小腿(或脚踝)的;(衣袖)长及手腕的
entry.def: A full-length coat or skirt is long enough to reach the lower part of a person's leg, almost to the ankles. A full-length sleeve reaches a person's wrist.
Full-length curtains or other furnishings reach to the floor.
A full-length mirror or painting shows the whole of a person.
Someone who is lying full-length, is lying down flat and stretched out.

means.word_mean: 1. accommodating the full height of the human figure;
2. representing the full height of the human figure;
